description: 被动语态表示主语是动作的承受者，强调动作的对象

explanation.basic_structure: 主语 + be动词 + 过去分词 + by + 动作执行者
basic_rules: 一般现在时：am/is/are + 过去分词
一般过去时：was/were + 过去分词
一般将来时：will be + 过去分词
现在进行时：am/is/are being + 过去分词
过去进行时：was/were being + 过去分词
现在完成时：have/has been + 过去分词
过去完成时：had been + 过去分词
情态动词被动：can/may/must/should + be + 过去分词
usage_cases: 当动作执行者不明确或不重要时：My bike was stolen.
当强调动作的承受者时：The Great Wall was built by ancient Chinese people.
在正式文体中：Visitors are requested not to touch the exhibits.
common_errors: The book is wrote by him. (错误) → The book is written by him. (正确)
The house was build last year. (错误) → The house was built last year. (正确)
English is speak all over the world. (错误) → English is spoken all over the world. (正确)
usage_tips: 有些动词没有被动语态，如状态动词（seem, belong, have等）
被动语态中by短语可以省略
注意不规则动词的过去分词形式

basic_usage: English is spoken all over the world.
This book was written by a famous author.
The meeting will be held next Monday.
The house is being built now.
The window was broken by the boy.
Cars are made in this factory.
The problem can be solved easily.
different_tenses: The letter is written by Tom. (一般现在时)
The letter was written by Tom. (一般过去时)
The letter will be written by Tom. (一般将来时)
The letter is being written by Tom. (现在进行时)
The letter was being written by Tom. (过去进行时)
The letter has been written by Tom. (现在完成时)
The letter had been written by Tom. (过去完成时)
with_modal_verbs: The work must be finished today.
The door can be opened easily.
The problem should be solved quickly.
The book ought to be returned.
without_by_phrase: The work will be finished soon.

templates.question: Which sentence is in passive voice?
templates.correct: A letter is written by him.
templates.explanation: 被动语态：be + 过去分词

templates.question: The house _____ last year.
templates.explanation: 一般过去时被动语态：was/were + 过去分词

templates.question: The work _____ by tomorrow.
templates.explanation: 一般将来时被动语态：will be + 过去分词

templates.question: The letter _____ (write) by Tom.
templates.explanation: 一般现在时被动语态：is/are + 过去分词

templates.question: The house _____ (build) last year.
templates.explanation: 一般过去时被动语态：was/were + 过去分词

templates.question: The work _____ (finish) by tomorrow.
templates.explanation: 一般将来时被动语态：will be + 过去分词

templates.sentence: The book is wrote by him.
templates.explanation: 被动语态用过去分词written，不用过去式wrote

templates.sentence: The house was build last year.
templates.explanation: 被动语态用过去分词built，不用动词原形build

templates.sentence: English is speak all over the world.
templates.explanation: 被动语态用过去分词spoken，不用动词原形speak

templates.passive: We are taught English by the teacher.
templates.explanation: 主动语态变被动语态：宾语变主语，动词变为be + 过去分词

templates.passive: The letter was written by Tom.
templates.explanation: 一般过去时主动变被动：was/were + 过去分词

templates.active: They will build a new school.
templates.passive: A new school will be built by them.
templates.explanation: 一般将来时主动变被动：will be + 过去分词

learning_objectives: 掌握被动语态的基本构成和用法
能够正确使用各种时态的被动语态
学会主动语态和被动语态的转换
能够在实际语境中正确使用被动语态

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用各种时态的被动语态，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握被动语态用法，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解被动语态基本用法，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对被动语态用法不熟悉，需要重新学习
